description:
A more secure way to browse the web

TunnelBear encrypts your internet connection to keep your online activity private on any network.
- Thanks to support from Localization Lab (localizationlab.org), our Bears are now fluent in Bengali.
- Brushed some fur, ate some bugs, 19 new bears added.
- Took the Bears to the groomers. Just love that New Bear smell, don't you?
